meanings.definition: The legal dissolution of a marriage.
meanings.sent1: The divorcement was finalized in court last week.
meanings.sent2: After the divorcement, they both felt a sense of relief.
meanings.sent3: The divorcement paperwork seemed to take longer than the actual marriage!
meanings.sent4: Their divorcement was like a sharp blade cutting through their once happy life.
meanings.sent5: The divorcement brought an end to years of unhappiness and arguments.

meanings.definition: The act of separating or disuniting.
meanings.sent1: The divorcement of the two countries led to increased tension.
meanings.sent2: The divorcement of the business partners was amicable.
meanings.sent3: The divorcement of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete.
